mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3 tally mark surveys, with quite a few responses (tally marks themselves not transcribed). Challenge to reader to not be negative for a day. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
The text within this image may be offensive to some.

(tallies) | Be my friend? yes | no | Fuck No | Fuck you | Fuck Me | | Suck my dick? yes | No | eat my pussy like groceries? yes | NO | yas. organic Trader Joe's only tho | Try and go a whole day w/p saying something negative about someone
